price: 18 En vérité, les pieux croyants sont promis aux plus hauts degrés[1564].
arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَٰبَ ٱلۡأَبۡرَارِ لَفِي عِلِّيِّينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: kallā inna kitāba al-abrāri lafī ʿilliyyīna
